title: With so many emotes in the game, to have a larger emote wheel would be nice
body:
Someone already managed to create some concept art as to what a larger wheel would look like...

https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/bax8ci/we_could_have_more_emotes_available_in_the_emote/

https://i.imgur.com/oZMabr3.png[]

replies.body:
can we do this for pings first?

at least put the "enemy has vision here" ping on the wheel.
And a new "please ward here" ping. I always have to use the "area is warded" or "need assistance" ping which confuses the shit out of my team most of the time.
If we are commiting, "I am about to ward here" would also be nice If it wouldn't make it overcrowded.

Yes. Yes. YES.
I want to use that ping so bad, but you have to put it on a key bind, and let me tell you, I know where I binded it, yet I dont use it, cuz its a pain to have to use the key bind (and my memory actually sucks).

> [{quoted}](name=Ragnaveil,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RjuApK96,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2019-07-07T18:26:37.446+0000)
>
> Yes. Yes. YES.
> I want to use that ping so bad, but you have to put it on a key bind, and let me tell you, I know where I binded it, yet I dont use it, cuz its a pain to have to use the key bind (and my memory actually sucks).

I actuality got it on my middle mouse click

> [{quoted}](name=Critmaster Garen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RjuApK96,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-07-07T18:20:05.651+0000)
>
> can we do this for pings first?
> 
> at least put the "enemy has vision here" ping on the wheel.

I put "Enemy Has Vision Here" on my mouse wheel button.
So, if I actually click down on the wheel, it will ping  it.
I've found it super useful.

I wish we could customize the ping wheel. No one has ever used the exclamation point ping in the history of League from the wheel because everyone uses the V danger ping instead. I would rather have that slot be the "enemy has vision ping" than something which is already on another hotkey.
people will be spamming emotes instead of playing the damn game aside of that  not a bad idea
people do that anyways
they will do it more now
How though? It’s not like this would decrease the spam cooldown timer or anything. Also never forget your mute options.
simply by having more options instead of just few that they will get bored of quickly
Really don’t know where you’re drawing this from. People can be more expressive I guess but you’re really just arguing a non-issue against this. No one is going to spam *more* because of this.
sure lol

ok emote spammer

judging by ur name not the only thing u spam

*Flashes emote*

You: **REEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEEE**

> [{quoted}](name=Luther King Jr V,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RjuApK96,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2019-07-07T18:37:46.720+0000)
>
> people will be spamming emotes instead of playing the damn game aside of that  not a bad idea

damn, you got shut down quickly, also you know, theres a mute emotes button
emote spammers are mad
Emote, Pings should have a bigger wheel already. I don't know what's taking so long.
It is RIOT games, they can't do that because trash employees.

You'd think Riot would be all over this.

More emotes that can be used = more emote sales.
There should also be loadouts for emotes like they have with rune pages that way if you have specific sets of emotes for different characters or skins you can quickly change them.
Maybe so Riot can get there money on with this concept to be able to purchase more spaces for emotes. That seems like something rito would do ngl.
Rito pls {{sticker:sg-lux}}
Can we get a better sorting mechanism for emotes first?
People who downvoted this are people who saw it was like, 130 upvotes 0 downvotes, and thought "I'm gonna be that dick that downvotes it"

> [{quoted}](name=The Painted Lady,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RjuApK96,comment-id=0013,timestamp=2019-07-09T16:29:21.267+0000)
>
> People who downvoted this are people who saw it was like, 130 upvotes 0 downvotes, and thought "I'm gonna be that dick that downvotes it"

https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/5f/Maybe_Next_Time_Emote.png/revision/latest?cb=20180224183508

Can't really do anything against this sort of thing.
"emotes arnt going to be Bm" riot games said that, i own all the BM ones {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

a larger emote wheel? this might be the most unnecessary bs waste of riot's time i've ever seen. with so many other things that actually need addressing like idk fucking gameplay? this is a video game after  all

Isn't that Kindred/Lamb emote fan made?
I don't think it made it in game.

Edit: After looking around it is a fan made emote.
Had a feeling cause I know Riot wouldn't make a emote for Kindred lol.
More emotes  = less typing =  less toxicity please rito this one is a no brainer

I would upvote this million times.

Even my friends make fun of me for constantly getting new emotes from hextech chests, so it would be nice if I could at least equip them.
give us a pentakill emoji too
yes we need one!
larger or, even better, emote set you could bind to some champ t switch easily between game
does anyone have a youtube link to the "animated dapingu" sticker? id like to know what it looks like.
They should have never been added to begin with, and need removed. Nothing but tools for trolls.

> [{quoted}](name=Thuban,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=RjuApK96,comment-id=0010,timestamp=2019-07-08T18:07:54.348+0000)
>
> They should have never been added to begin with, and need removed. Nothing but tools for trolls.

You can mute them, so you have literally no point. Go be a tiny special flower somewhere else.

I literally only have positive emotes on my wheel to tell my team mates they're awesome or I liked what they did.

Don't pigeon hole everyone in the world into your cynical pessimism.
I barely even use emotes at all, and yet I still logged in to upvote this because its a damn fine point.

I would also like a mastery emote option. I don't feel like flashing my M7 when I get first blood on Yas.
{{champion:157}}
